Verify the 'Buy now' button becomes active with background color #ff4500
Perform a scroll-top action
Verify the header remains sticky with z-index 100
Check that the language selector has aria-label set to 'Select language'
Navigate to 'https://myapp.com/signup'
Confirm the 'Email address' input field displays placeholder text 'user@example.com', has an initial value of '', width 300px, height 40px, and a border color #cccccc
Verify the 'Password' input uses font family 'monospace' for typed text and letter spacing 0.8px
Ensure the 'Remember me' checkbox is unchecked by default, its label text is 'Remember me', and has a left margin of 10px
Verify the 'Sign Up' button is disabled initially, with background color #eeeeee, text color #999999, and font weight 500
Verify the error message div is hidden by default with display none
Verify on error, the error message div's text color changes to #ff0000 and font size becomes 14px
Check form elements have a row gap of 15px and column gap of 0px
Confirm the timestamp for the submission button is not present initially
Visit 'https://mywebsite.com/'
Verify the navigation bar has a height of 60px, background color #2c3e50, and is fixed positioned at top 0px
Confirm 'About' navigation link displays text 'About', has font size 16px, text color #ffffff, and padding 10px 15px
On hover, the 'About' link's background color should change to #34495e with a transition duration of 0.3s ease-in
The logo image must have source 'logo.png', natural dimensions 100x40px, and a filter brightness(1.2)
The search icon should be clickable with cursor type 'pointer'
Verify the dropdown menu for 'Services' has display none and opacity 0 initially
Go to 'https://dashboard.com/users'
Verify the user data table uses border-collapse, has a width of 100%, overflow x hidden, and scroll-left 0px
The table header cell containing 'Name' should display the text 'Name', have font weight 600, and background color #f2f2f2
The first data row must have an alternating background color #f9f9f9 and a minimum height of 45px
The user count display element should show the exact text 'Showing 10 of 100 users' with font size 14px
The 'Next Page' pagination button must be enabled and display text 'Next'
Verify the timestamp of the last update is '2023-10-26 10:30:00'
Click button to open a modal
Confirm the modal overlay has a background color rgba(0,0,0,0.7), z-index 9999, and display block
The modal content area must have a width of 500px, a maximum height of 75vh, box shadow 0px 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), and overflow y 'scroll'
The modal heading should display the text 'Confirm Action' and be text aligned to center
The close button ('X') must be positioned at top 15px, right 15px, have font size 20px, text color #aaaaaa, and cursor type 'pointer'
Verify the modal is focused true, and body elements are not interactable
The modal element should have aria-label 'Confirmation dialog'
Navigate to 'https://landingpage.com/'
Verify the hero section has a minimum height of 600px, uses display flex, justifies content to center, and its clip property is set to 'auto'
The background image should have background-image url('hero-bg.jpg'), background-size cover, and background-position center
The main heading 'Welcome to Our Service' must have font size 48px, line height 1.2, and text color #ffffff
The call to action button 'Get Started Now' should have background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, border radius 8px, and a top margin of 30px
Ensure any image watermark is visible true with an opacity of 0.5
Access 'https://profile.com/user/edit'
Confirm the avatar image has source 'avatar.jpg', rendered width 100px, rendered height 100px, border radius 50%, and object fit cover
Verify the avatar image load time is less than 500ms
The 'User Name' text field should display value 'John Doe', have font size 16px, and a border bottom color #337ab7
The email display element must show text content 'john.doe@example.com' using font family 'Arial'
The 'Edit Profile' button must be visible, enabled, have background color #17a2b8, and padding 10px 20px
The 'Save Changes' button should be disabled initially with cursor 'not-allowed'
Check that any animated element has its offset path set to 'none'
Go to 'https://shop.com/cart'
Verify the cart item list displays a count of 3 items and uses display block
Each item row must have a minimum height of 100px and padding 15px
Verify that quantity updates trigger a 300ms animation on the item row
The product name text should have font weight bold and text color #333333
The quantity input field must show value '1', have a width of 50px, and border color #ced4da
The total price display should present text content 'Total: $149.97', with font size 22px and font family 'Roboto'
The checkout button must have background color #28a745, text content 'Proceed to Checkout', and a width of 200px
Open 'https://blog.com/article/latest'
Confirm the article title displays text 'Understanding Modern CSS', has font size 36px, and a bottom margin of 20px
The first paragraph element should have text align justify, line height 1.6em, font family 'Georgia', and word spacing 0.5px
An image within the article must have source 'article_hero.jpg', rendered width 100%, display block, and margin auto
The author name link should have text color #007bff and text decoration none
The date timestamp element must display '2023-10-25' with font size 12px
Ensure overflow block is 'clip'
Navigate to 'https://video.com/player/clip'
Verify the video player has a width of 100%, height 56.25vw, and background color black
The play button must be visible, display a specific play icon, and have a color of white
The volume slider should show a value of 75% and its current position reflects this
The fullscreen button must be visible, enabled, and indicate a 'not fullscreen' state
The video element itself should be muted false and have controls true
The progress bar must have its width updated based on video progress, indicating 50% completion
The time display should show '0:00' for current time and '2:30' for total duration
Access 'https://dashboard.com/overview'
Confirm the widget title 'Sales Overview' has font size 20px and font weight 600
The chart canvas must have a width of 600px, height 400px, and a border of 1px solid #cccccc
The data points within the chart must have a count of 5, with fill color #4CAF50 for the bars
Legend labels should have font size 12px and color #555555
The 'Last Updated' timestamp must have font size 10px and color #777777
Verify box sizing for all widgets is border-box
Ensure the stroke color of chart lines is #007bff
Go to 'https://app.com/settings'
Verify the section heading 'Notifications' has font size 24px and a bottom margin of 25px
The toggle switch for 'Email alerts' must be checked initially and have aria-label 'Enable email alerts'
Verify the toggle switch background color when on is #28a745
The dropdown 'Language' should show 'English' as the current value and have a border color #ced4da
The 'Save' button must be disabled initially with an opacity of 0.6
The help icon should be clickable with cursor type 'help'
Ensure the settings section has a min width of 800px
Open 'https://gallery.com/photos'
Verify the photo gallery grid uses display grid, with a column gap of 20px and row gap of 20px
Each photo item must have a width of 250px, height 180px, and object fit cover
Verify each photo item displays a box shadow on hover 0px 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)
Ensure thumbnails apply a rotate(5deg) transformation on hover
The lightbox overlay should be hidden initially with display none and have a z-index of 999
The image displayed in the lightbox must have its source 'large_photo.jpg', a maximum width of 80vw, and a maximum height of 80vh
Verify image load time for the main lightbox image is less than 1s
The caption text below the image should be text aligned to center with font size 15px
Navigate to 'https://calendar.com/'
Confirm the current month display shows text content 'October 2023' with font size 24px
The day cell for '25' must have a background color #e0e0e0 and a border radius of 50%
An event marker should indicate exactly 1 event on the 27th, with a color of #ff6347
The 'Previous Month' and 'Next Month' buttons must be visible, enabled, and display appropriate icons
The selected date (e.g., 20th) must have background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Verify line height for day numbers is 1.2em
Check the calendar grid has an offset width of 700px
Perform search for 'laptop'
The search results count element should display text 'Showing 10 results' with font size 14px
Each search result item must have a minimum height of 150px, padding 15px, and a border bottom 1px solid #eeeeee
The product name link must have text color #007bff, text decoration none, and font weight bold
The price display should show 'Price: $999.99' with font size 18px and text color #cc0000
The filter sidebar must have a width of 250px, a background color #f8f9fa, and overflow y 'scroll'
The 'Apply Filters' button must be enabled, have background color #28a745, and text color #ffffff
Trigger a success notification

Verify the toast notification is visible, positioned at top 20px, right 20px, has a background color #28a745, box shadow 0px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), transition opacity 0.3s ease-out, and z-index 9999
The notification message should display text content 'Item added successfully', with font size 16px
The dismiss button ('X') must be visible, have a color of white, and a cursor type 'pointer'
Confirm the toast auto-dismisses after exactly 5s
Open 'https://devtool.com/editor'
Verify the code editor area uses font family 'Monaco', font size 14px, background color #282c34, letter spacing 0.5px, overflow x hidden, and white space pre-wrap
Line numbers must be visible, have a color #636f8a, and a width of 40px
The keyword 'function' should display with text color #c678dd
A string literal like ''hello'' must have text color #98c379
The cursor should be blinking true with a color of #abb2bf
Navigate to 'https://music.com/player/track'
Verify the audio player is visible, has a width of 100%, background color #333333, and a min width of 300px
The Play/Pause button must display a 'play' icon, have a color of white, and a size of 32px
The volume icon should be visible and indicate a 'not muted' state
The seek bar must show its current position reflecting 30% progress
The seek bar progress part must have a background color #007bff
The track title display should show text content 'Awesome Song', font size 18px, and text overflow ellipsis
The artist name must have font size 14px and color #aaaaaa
Open 'https://maps.com/location'
Verify the map canvas has a width of 100vw, height 100vh, and display block
There should be exactly 1 location marker displayed, using a 'red pin' icon, positioned at x 50% and y 50% relative to the map
The 'Zoom in' button must be visible, enabled, display a '+' icon, have a background color #ffffff, and aria-label 'Zoom in'
The 'Zoom out' button must be visible, enabled, display a '-' icon, and aria-label 'Zoom out'
Verify that map panning applies a scale(1.05) transformation
Check the offset position of the map center is (0,0) on initial load

Verify the hamburger menu icon is visible, has background color #333333, width 30px, and height 24px
The main navigation links should have display none
The hero image must use background size contain and have a width of 100%
A main text block should display with font size 16px and line height 1.5
The footer element must be text aligned to center and have padding 20px
Ensure overflow x for the entire page is hidden
Confirm that main navigation links transition to display flex when the viewport width is greater than 768px

Confirm the price text is color #E53E3E and font weight 600
